name: Sir, SERVE!
description:
Welcome to Sir, SERVE!

As a Fast Food Angel, you are tasked with feeding people fast food to rescue your business from the Vegetable Industry. 

Watch out! You may accidentally feed passerby broccoli, and no one wants to have that.

Controls:
  • Use the A and D keys to move around.
  •  Move your mouse around and Fast Food Angel will always look towards it. Hold the Left Mouse Button on your mouse to wind up your Serving Spatula, and let go to release a  food item.
Objective:
  • Shoot people with food to increase the "People Fed" counter.
  • Avoid landing broccoli on passerby! This will decrease the "People Fed" counter.

 

Some Backstory: This game was produced solo within 6 hours for MIT BLUEPRINT 2022, under the "Game Dev" Track. 

This game was made by Aniket Chaudhry, mostly using Unity 2019.4 and Piskel.
